analysis.key_quote: By allowing career civil service employees to be fired at will by the executive, politics will be injected into the standard processes of governance.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reclassification of career civil service employees, highlighting concerns about politicization and the potential negative impact on the quality and stability of the civil service. It emphasizes the risks associated with allowing political influence over employee retention, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
